remarks: Double complement and subset.  Similar to ~ ddifss but inside a class ` B ` instead of the universal class ` _V ` .  In classical logic the subset operation on the right hand side could be an equality (that is, ` A C_ B <-> ( B \ ( B \ A ) ) = A ` ).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 24-Jul-2018.)
statement: ssddif $p |- ( A C_ B <-> A C_ ( B \ ( B \ A ) ) ) $.
